amendment.description: To provide temporary State fiscal relief.

action.text: Amendment SA 564 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 564 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 158.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 564.
Amendment SA 564 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S6210-6214; text: CR S6210-6211) To provide temporary State fiscal relief.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 564 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 158.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 564 proposed by Senator Murray.
